short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate tool for seamless ticket creation right from any web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our Chrome Peanut Gallery Extension, the ultimate tool for seamless ticket creation right from any web page. With this extension, you can effortlessly create bug or task tickets directly in your Jira portal (In future we will support more plateform), under your specified project. Say goodbye to wasting time navigating to the Jira portal and manually attaching screenshots - our extension simplifies the process, allowing you to create tickets with speed and efficiency.

Features:

- Instant Ticket Creation: Create bug or task tickets instantly, right from any web page you're currently browsing.
- Streamlined Workflow: Eliminate the need to switch between multiple tabs or applications. Stay focused on your work while effortlessly creating Jira tickets.
- Screenshot Integration: Capture and attach screenshots directly to the ticket. No more manual downloads or uploads - it's all done seamlessly within the extension.
- Ticket Summary: Provide a concise summary of the issue or task, giving your team a clear understanding of the ticket's purpose.
- Ticket Heading: Specify the ticket heading or title for easy identification and organisation within your Jira project.
- Project Selection: Choose the specific project within your Jira portal where the ticket should be created, ensuring it lands in the right place.
- Time-Saving Solution: With our extension, you can create Jira tickets swiftly, without wasting precious time navigating through various portals or attaching screenshots manually.

Experience the convenience and efficiency of our Chrome Jira Extension today. Simplify your ticket creation process and focus on what truly matters - delivering exceptional results to your team.
